item.title: David Cronenberg’s The Shrouds Explores the Future of Death
item.dc:creator: Justin Carter
item.description: Vincent Cassel, Diane Kruger, and Guy Pearce tackle grief and the rotting dead in The Shrouds.
item.content:encoded: Vincent Cassel, Diane Kruger, and Guy Pearce tackle grief and the rotting dead in The Shrouds.

item.title: Spider-Noir May Get Black-and-White Release
item.dc:creator: Justin Carter
item.description: Well, he is the black-and-white Spider-Man, so why wouldn't his show also be in complete black-and-white?
item.content:encoded: Well, he is the black-and-white Spider-Man, so why wouldn't his show also be in complete black-and-white?

item.title: Horizon Actor Ashly Burch Speaks on Sony’s AI Aloy Video
item.dc:creator: Justin Carter
item.description: A genAI Aloy may not pop up in Horizon 3, but the possibility has still left a bad taste in viewers' mouths.
item.content:encoded: A genAI Aloy may not pop up in Horizon 3, but the possibility has still left a bad taste in viewers' mouths.

item.title: Marvel’s Imperial Event Will Change Its Hierarchy of Cosmic Power
item.dc:creator: Justin Carter
item.description: Jonathan Hickman's ready to shake up Marvel's world again with Federico Vizentini and Iban Coello in the cosmic epic Imperial.
item.content:encoded: Jonathan Hickman's ready to shake up Marvel's world again with Federico Vizentini and Iban Coello in the cosmic epic Imperial.

item.title: Scientists Discover Potential Ozempic Rival That Could Help People Lose Weight With Less Nausea
item.dc:creator: Ed Cara
item.description: Stanford Medicine researchers have identified a promising, naturally occurring molecule that could help people lose weight—without the nauseating symptoms now commonly seen with GLP-1 drugs.
item.content:encoded: Stanford Medicine researchers have identified a promising, naturally occurring molecule that could help people lose weight—without the nauseating symptoms now commonly seen with GLP-1 drugs.

item.title: Wild ‘Waterbending’ Technique Uses Waves to Steer Floating Objects With Precision
item.dc:creator: Margherita Bassi
item.description: Researchers manipulated water waves to move ping pong balls and grains of rice with a level of precision that seems straight out of a sci-fi movie.
item.content:encoded: Researchers manipulated water waves to move ping pong balls and grains of rice with a level of precision that seems straight out of a sci-fi movie.

item.title: AI Sucks at Reading Clocks
item.dc:creator: Margherita Bassi
item.description: Large language models still struggle with simple tasks like telling time.
item.content:encoded: Large language models still struggle with simple tasks like telling time.

item.title: Scientists Discover Troves of New Species at the Ocean’s Deepest Depths
item.dc:creator: Margherita Bassi
item.description: Researchers descended more than 35,700 feet (10,900 meters) below sea level to collect biological samples that revealed surprising diversity. And also trash.
item.content:encoded: Researchers descended more than 35,700 feet (10,900 meters) below sea level to collect biological samples that revealed surprising diversity. And also trash.

item.title: The Lilo & Stitch Trailer Has Given Disney Another Brag-Worthy Milestone
item.dc:creator: Justin Carter
item.description: Looks like Disney's putting its live-action faith in the Lilo & Stitch remake and taking the chance to highlight its social media impact.
item.content:encoded: Looks like Disney's putting its live-action faith in the Lilo & Stitch remake and taking the chance to highlight its social media impact.

item.title: Percy Jackson is Already Fated For a Third Season

item.description: Disney's keeping the Percy Jackson train a-going with another season that'll adapt 2007's The Titan's Curse.
item.content:encoded: Disney's keeping the Percy Jackson train a-going with another season that'll adapt 2007's The Titan's Curse.

item.title: The Next Major Star Wars Game Will Be at Star Wars Celebration
item.dc:creator: Justin Carter
item.description: Bit Reactor and Respawn's turn-based tactics game will have its grand unveiling at Star Wars Celebration in Tokyo, Japan.
item.content:encoded: Bit Reactor and Respawn's turn-based tactics game will have its grand unveiling at Star Wars Celebration in Tokyo, Japan.

item.title: Apple Overpromised on AI Siri and Its Staff Is Not Happy About it

item.title: An Early Mass Extinction Event Cooked Our Planet and Erased Most Life
item.dc:creator: Margherita Bassi
item.description: A new study reveals that Earth's biomes changed dramatically in the wake of mass volcanic eruptions 252 million years ago.
item.content:encoded: A new study reveals that Earth's biomes changed dramatically in the wake of mass volcanic eruptions 252 million years ago.

item.description: The advertising industry is immensely powerful, and disturbingly opaque.
item.content:encoded: The advertising industry is immensely powerful, and disturbingly opaque.

item.title: When It Comes to Unwanted Weight Gain, Humans and Labradors Have This in Common

item.content:encoded: New research suggests humans and labradors might be predisposed to gaining weight for similar reasons.

item.title: Patient With Artificial Heart Smashes Survival Record
item.dc:creator: Ed Cara
item.description: The patient, an Australian man in his 40s, lived with his fully functional heart implant long enough to be discharged from the hospital.
item.content:encoded: The patient, an Australian man in his 40s, lived with his fully functional heart implant long enough to be discharged from the hospital.

item.content:encoded: The sequel to Disney's 2003 hit starring Lindsay Lohan and Jamie Lee Curtis opens August 8.
